sources.title: The Treasure of Jamaica Reef
sources.description: AKA: Evil in the Deep A suspense filled adventure-drama about the search for a treasure-laden Spanish Galleon that sank over 200 years ago.

sources.title: The Treasure of Jamaica Reef (1974) Directed by Virginia L. Stone. Rips your nerves to shreds!
sources.description:
A suspense filled adventure-drama about the search for a treasure-laden Spanish Galleon that sank over 200 years ago.

Director: Virginia L. Stone
Writers: John Walker, J.A.S. McCrombie

Main cast:
Stephen Boyd - Hugo Graham
Cheryl Ladd - Zappy (credited as Cheryl Stoppelmoor)
Chuck Woolery - Victor Spivak
David Ladd - Joshua Owens
Darby Hinton - Darby
Rosey Grier - Asper (credited as Roosevelt Grier)


Genre: Adventure
Release date: March 1975
Filming locations: Grenada, Jamaica


0:00:00 – Foreword: The film begins with Hugo Graham briefing his crew about the sunken Spanish galleon, and receiving salvage rights.
0:01:19 – Movie Credits - full film with subtitles
0:12:45 – Zappy discovers an old map hinting at the treasure's location.
0:27:30 – Victor Spivak confronts Hugo about the risks of their expedition.
0:43:15 – Joshua Owens reveals a personal connection to the sunken ship.
0:58:50 – The crew encounters unexpected dangers while diving near the reef.
1:14:25 – Darby deciphers a clue that leads them closer to the treasure.
1:22:30 – The team faces a final showdown as they unearth the long-lost treasure.

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: A suspense filled adventure-drama about the search for a treasure-laden Spanish Galleon that sank over 200 years ago.
metadata.Actors: Stephen Boyd, David Ladd, Chuck Woolery
